p: An inhaled corticosteroid compound, ciclesonide has been suggested as a potential drug against the COVID-19 ( Matsuyama et al., 2020). The compound suppressed SARS-CoV-2 replication in cultured cells, where the suppression was mainly related to the targeting viral nonstructural protein 15 (nsp 15) ( Matsuyama et al., 2020). It is expected that inhaled ciclesonide can reduce viral replication and host inflammation in the lungs.
